thread.title: Donald Trump says US will work to restore peace in Ukraine
thread.title_full: Donald Trump says US will work to restore peace in Ukraine

author: Reuters
title: Donald Trump says US will work to restore peace in Ukraine
text:
Donald Trump says US will work to restore peace in Ukraine Donald Trump says US will work to restore peace in Ukraine President Donald Trump told Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko the United States will work to restore peace along the border with Russia. By: Reuters | Washington   6:06 AM Donald Trump says he has agreed to attend the G-7 Summit in Taormina, Italy in May.(Source: Reuters) 
President Donald Trump told Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko the United States will work to restore peace along the border with Russia. 
“We will work with Ukraine, Russia, and all other parties involved to help them restore peace along the border,” Trump said in a White House statement on Saturday. 
Renewed violence has flared between Moscow-backed rebels and Ukraine government forces that has caused the highest casualty rate since mid-December. 
You may also like to watch this video 
Separately, Trump reiterated to Italian Prime Minister Paolo Gentiloni the U.S. commitment to NATO and emphasized the importance of all NATO allies sharing the monetary burden of defense spending. Trump said he has agreed to attend the G-7 Summit in Taormina, Italy in May.
